de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network

Class NetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.Handler
      • de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.NetworkHandler

  • class NetworkHandler
extends android.os.Handler
    The Network Handler to get access to the UI Thread of android. The Handler is used to get a message from a network Thread and then passes on the message to the network listener so that you get this message in the ui Thread. In the UI thread you can modify all views from android layout.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.Handler

      • setNetworkListener

        public void setNetworkListener(NetworkListener networkListener)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the network listener for a request. You have to set the listener each time before sending a new request!
        Parameters:
        networkListener - An istance of a Network Listener
        Throws:
